fields.name: General
fields.value:
• Melee and short-ranged troops will target the closest troops.
• Magic apprentice and Demon are immune while in flight. When in flight, Magic apprentice and Demon cannot be targeted by melee and short-ranged troops. When in flight, Magic apprentice and Demon can be targeted by long-ranged troops but will receieve no damage.
• Troops will pursue their targets until their targets are killed.

fields.name: Retargetting
fields.value:
• When a troops unit is affected by *knock-back*, *stun*, or *taunt*, the unit will reselect a new target.
• Rhino Knight and Pumpkin Guard will select a new target after each attack. Because they force enemy units to retarget with their knock-back/taunt skills, Rhino Knight and Pumpkin Guard can effectively distract many enemy units.

fields.name: Tip - Backline Defense
fields.value:
• Your backline defenders will not turn back until their first targets are killed.
• To defend your backline, put your strongest units in the front to kill enemy front line quickly, or use Goblikazes, Pirate Ship, Undead Soldier, or single-load tanks in the back.

fields.name: Tip - Backline Attack
fields.value:
• Enemy backline defenders will not turn back until their first targets are killed.
• To increase the effectiveness of your backline attackers, put your strongest units in the front line.

fields.name: Tip - Pirate Ship
fields.value: • A Pirate Ship will select a target at start of battle and walk toward the target to throw the boat. It will *not* wait for enemy units to come within range and then choose a target. To effectively use Pirate Ship at front line, don't put them too far back.
